module.name: document_assignment

change.description: Extensible types need to be marked GENERIC_ENTITY.

module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of assignments of documentation to product or activity data. The application module also supports the requirement to assign sections of documents to product or activity data.

inscope.li: assignment of documents to product or activity data;
assignment of parts or sections of documents to product or activity data.

description.p: The Document_Assignment UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of assigning documents to objects. The UoF also specified the definitional information for assigning parts or sections of documents to objects.

alt_map.description: If the assignment is not a partial document assignment.
If the assignment is a partial document assignment.
